data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: This is a simple problem. But ____ goal ____ to ____ all ____ our ____ tools. One ____ more ____ these ____ are ____ to ____ us ____ the ____. The goal is to experience success with each of them now, so we know what failure looks like.
data.partBlankContent: This is a simple problem. But t__ goal i_ to prac____ all o_ our mathem______ tools. One o_ more o_ these to___ are go___ to fa__ us i_ the fut___. The goal is to experience success with each of them now, so we know what failure looks like.
data.fullContent: This is a simple problem. But the goal is to practice all of our mathematical tools. One or more of these tools are going to fail us in the future. The goal is to experience success with each of them now, so we know what failure looks like.
data.answer: 这是一个简单的问题。但我们的目标是练习所有的数学工具。这些工具中的一个或多个将来会让我们失望。我们的目标是和他们每一个人一起体验成功，这样我们就知道失败是什么样子了。
